summary: A former political henchman seeks out revenge for being dropped by a ruthless politician while a determined investigator tries to find proof of a connection between the two of them.
cast: Lee Byung-Hun|Seung-woo Cho|Yun-shik Baek|Kyeong-yeong Lee|Sung-Woo Bae|Deok-jae Jo|Jae-yoon Jo|Woo-jin Jo|Dae-Myung Kim|Hong-pa Kim|Jin-yeong Park|Jong-hak Son
title: Nae-bu-ja-deul
